summary:
Replaces \"The Dragonborn Comes\" with the BEST version out there, sung by Malufenix (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z9TdDCWN7g)
NPC\'s affected;
Pantea Ateia (Solitude: Bards College)
Lisette (Solitude: The Winking Skever)
Luaffyn (Windhelm: Candlehearth Hall)
descriptionHtml:
SONG CREDIT:  Malufenix (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4z9TdDCWN7g)

When I first heard this cover, tears began to well in my eyes...I knew then that I must hear it while playing Skyrim. Replacement of a bard song was the perfect place to start, and after some searching, I found a mod here (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2539). 
That basically did what I want, however, the lip sync was totally off for me (I found that each sentence of the song is its own .fuz file). So, I cut the cover song into 8 sentences and added a tiny fade out to the end of each bit. Then put it all together with doubled up vocals at the end for added epicness ;)

After a handy comment from elite403, I was able to merge it with another mod from STSG (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2842). This adds the lute actions into the mix :O

Hope you all enjoy :)
Endorse and comment!
Carpe Diem
author: K3FKA
